Sentencas: Porous composites containing ceramic fiber have been developed for the fabrication of SOFC seals.
Titulo: Sealing behavior of visco-elastic composite seals for SOFC applications

Sentencas: They were fabricated using glass powder and alumino-silicate chopped fibers.
Titulo: Sealing behavior of visco-elastic composite seals for SOFC applications

Sentencas: Effect of mixing ratios of ceramic fiber and glass on the leak rates and strength of the composite seals was investigated, In addition, seat performance of commercial glasses was compared with that of SiO2-BaO-B2O3 glass synthesized in this work.
Titulo: Sealing behavior of visco-elastic composite seals for SOFC applications

Sentencas: The leak rate of the composite seals containing 55 vol% glass was seven times higher than the one containing 75 vol% glass.
Titulo: Sealing behavior of visco-elastic composite seals for SOFC applications

Sentencas: The flexural strength of the composite seals was reduced to one fourth of the initial value as the porosity increased from 1 to 29%.
Titulo: Sealing behavior of visco-elastic composite seals for SOFC applications

Sentencas: The incorporation of alumino-silicate chopped fibers into a seating glass degraded room temperature strength and increased leak rates due to increase in porosity with increasing fiber content.
Titulo: Sealing behavior of visco-elastic composite seals for SOFC applications

Sentencas: The viscosity of glass at the seal test temperature is presumed to affect the leak rate of the glass seal.
Titulo: Sealing behavior of visco-elastic composite seals for SOFC applications
